System requirements:
==========================

Intel Core 2 DUO 2.00GHZ or faster

The sound device compatible with DirectX 9
DirectX 9
Free disk space: 600 MGB



Game information:
=================

A unique species of the genre, "Fighting", which differs from other unusual graphics. After the game is presented in the form of recorded movies and assembled into one! In Stay dead, despite the fact that the graphics are completely filmed in real life, you
can move your character, and you can carry more than 150 different methods, distributed in 5 stages. Use all of the classic fighting game traffic, and just watch the outcome of your tricks never previously unseen spectacle that can provide this cinematic direction.


Play in real time in an action movie and defeat all your enemies in this innovative beat'em up. Stay Dead is our first motion picture games. A Motion picture game is a true interactive meeting point between movies and videogames. Playing this kind of game is
like watching the movie 'Indiana Jones' and being able to command Indiana IN REAL TIME, just like if he was a videogame character. It's not about graphic adventures or laser games, we are talking about REAL ARCADE-ACTION GAME.
